current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: Making continuing appropriations of local funds of the District of Columbia for fiscal year 2014.

action-desc.#text: Received; read the first time, read the second time, and placed on the calendar pursuant to the order of October 2, 2013

quote.#text: District of Columbia Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2014

text.#text: This joint resolution may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: (D.C. Act 20–127), as modified as of the date of the enactment of this joint resolution.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Fiscal Year 2014 Budget Request Act of 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Fiscal Year 2014 Budget Request Act of 2013

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Committee on Appropriations of the House of Representatives

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}prop.#text: for such programs and activities under

quote.#text: District of Columbia Funds--Summary of Expenses

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}fund.#text: at the rate set forth under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: The District of Columbia may expend local funds under the heading

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: are provided under the authority and conditions as provided under the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Provide Local Funding for the District of Columbia Act/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: and shall be available to the extent and in the manner that would be provided by such Act.

text.#text: Appropriations made and authority granted pursuant to this joint resolution shall cover all obligations or expenditures incurred for any project or activity during the period for which funds or authority for such project or activity are available under this joint resolution.

Unless otherwise provided for in this joint resolution or in the applicable appropriations Act for fiscal year 2014, appropriations and funds made available and authority granted pursuant to this joint resolution shall be available until whichever of the following first occurs: (1) the enactment into law of an appropriation for any project or activity provided for in this joint resolution; (2) the enactment into law of the applicable appropriations Act for fiscal year 2014 without any provision for such project or activity; or (3) December 15, 2013.

Expenditures made pursuant to this joint resolution shall be charged to the applicable appropriation, fund, or authorization whenever a bill in which such applicable appropriation, fund, or authorization is contained is enacted into law.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , but nothing in this joint resolution may be construed to waive any other provision of law governing the apportionment of funds.

text.#text: Appropriations made and funds made available by or authority granted pursuant to this joint resolution may be used without regard to the time limitations for submission and approval of apportionments set forth in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: that this joint resolution may also be referred to as the

quote.#text: Provide Local Funding for the District of Columbia Act

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives October 2, 2013.

action-desc.#text: Received; read the first time, read the second time, and placed on the calendar pursuant to the order of October 2, 2013
